triples.name: Reinforcement Learning
triples.relevance: This survey reviews offline reinforcement learning, a subfield focused on learning policies from fixed datasets without online interaction with environments.

triples.name: Offline Learning
triples.relevance: Offline learning is the core methodology covered in this tutorial, enabling learning from previously collected data without active data collection.

triples.name: Deep Reinforcement Learning
triples.relevance: The paper discusses modern deep reinforcement learning methods and their challenges in the offline setting.

triples.name: Decision-making
triples.relevance: The primary goal of offline RL is to create powerful decision-making engines from large datasets across multiple domains.

triples.name: Robotics
triples.relevance: Robotics is identified as a key application domain where offline RL could enable automation of complex control tasks.
